means: 扫( sweep的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Helicopters with searchlights swept the park which was sealed off.
sentence.Network_cn: 直升飞机的探照灯来回扫射这个被封锁的公园。

sentence.Network_en: He had been swept aside in the whirlwind of reform and anarchy.
sentence.Network_cn: 在改革和无政府状态交织的混乱风暴中，他被抛在了一边，没人理睬。

sentence.Network_en: Blasts of cold air swept down from the mountains.
sentence.Network_cn: 强冷气流从山上疾掠而下。
